overview: 411 Video Productions and Ventura Distribution present the first entry in the CKY series of extreme stunts and skateboarding programs. Directed by and featuring Bam Margera of Jackass, CKY features the same kind of madness and one-upmanship that made that show an overnight success on MTV. The program also features appearances by Tony Hawk, George Rowley, Arto Saari, and Mike Vall
title: Landspeed presents: CKY
